Package org.koolapp.stream

See:
          Description

Traits Summary
Cursor Represents the processing of a Stream by a Handler
which can be closed via the Closeable interface
NonBlockingCursor A Cursor which can woken up by a NonBlockingHandler
to resume event delivery.
 

Classes Summary
Handler Handles asynchronous events from a stream.
NonBlockingHandler Handles asynchronous events from a stream where flow control may be required if the handler cannot process the next event.
SimpleStream A simple Stream that can have elements injected into its active Handler instances
Stream Represents an asynchronous stream of events which can be composed and processed asynchronously.
 

Extensions Summary
java.lang.Iterable toStream
java.util.Timer fixedDelayStream fixedRateStream scheduleStream
java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService scheduleAtFixedRateStream scheduleStream scheduleWithFixedDelayStream
org.koolapp.stream.Cursor toNonBlockingCursorCursor
org.koolapp.stream.Handler toTimerRunnable toTimerTask
org.koolapp.stream.Stream groupBy
